script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: So let me get this straight. This... reconstruction engine... reprograms people's minds?

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: To take control of captured Villain Corp. agents?

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: That's what I've been told, yes.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: That's... terrifying. Really putting the Hero in Hero Corp., Penny.

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Look don't bitch... I mean, complain, to me.
I was only given access to this intel after the first attack. I didn't know about this either.
We can discuss all the moral implications later. Right now we need to take the reconstruction engine back from Villain Corp.

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Heads up and move slow. This facility is crawling with Villain Corp.

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Hero Corp. approaching. Orders are to not let them reach the engine.

script.speaker: HorizonDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: Contact with enemy agents is prohibited.

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Those bastards must have used the reconstruction engine on her!

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Come off your high horse, sis. Your sides been doing it for years.
